title: So uh, remind me how tanks are even considered tanks.
body:
546 armor, 4.2k health... yet a Yi with not one armor pen item can instantly kill me. Okay then. So remind me what good tanks are?

In this clip, these are the builds:

{{champion:11}} - {{item:1419}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3155}} {{item:3124}} 

vs.

{{champion:33}} - {{item:2303}} {{item:3075}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3047}} 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H_rCXIJEnaw&feature=youtu.be

Remind me what tanks do, again?

replies.body:
1. He had {{item:1419}}, which deals 4% max hp
2. He had {{item:3153}}, which deals 8% current hp
3. He had {{item:3036}}, which I'm not sure why you're pretending he didn't. He bought it at 36 minutes into the game, this clip is at 43 minutes.
4. He had {{item:3124}}, which was at max stacks from taking red buff.
5. His E gives him bonus true damage

Also he never had {{item:3006}}. His build at that time was {{item:1419}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3036}} {{item:3155}}

> [{quoted}](name=dynikus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TgBjiYaJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-30T23:35:21.363+0000)
>
> 1. He had {{item:1419}}, which deals 4% max hp

Physical damage.

> 2. He had {{item:3153}}, which deals 8% current hp

Also physical damage.

> 3. He had {{item:3036}}, which I'm not sure why you're pretending he didn't. He bought it at 36 minutes into the game, this clip is at 43 minutes.

When I hit tab after I died, I didn't see an LDR, so. Even if he did have an LDR, I'd still have well over 300 armor, in which case I'm still taking less than 30% damage from his autos. (Armor formula says 22% at 350 armor) And he still does a flat 12% less because of Tabi.

> 5. His E gives him bonus true damage

And remind me why he has that? And if ONLY HIS TRUE DAMAGE is doing anything meaningful... that's 100 per auto, if that. Unless he can auto 42 times in half a second, there's no reason for me to have died that fast.

> [{quoted}](name=Sciela,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TgBjiYaJ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-01-31T00:03:58.863+0000)
>
> Physical damage.
> 
> Also physical damage.
> 


Don't be stupid. Damage type hardly matters when it's %maxhp with %armor pen.

The rageblade procing bloodrazer alone with bortk on the first hit double procing would deal 24%max of your hp. (Around 900 dmg) And that's with the first hit.

I like how you act like your armor should still be meaningful after being reduced by 200.

> [{quoted}](name=Sciela,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TgBjiYaJ,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-31T00:52:03.228+0000)
>
> 900 * .22 = 198.

Yes, that's the minimum damage you would take from those items, and a 1 damage auto attack.

Yi has over 200 dmg autos, with true damage as a base on that.

Then there is the 15% bonus damage you take from his giant slayer.

So you're taking about 25% of the physical damage he would be dealing . (45% reduction on bonus armor from LDR, 7% pen from battering blows)
Before reduction:
{{item:1419}} does 4% max health per auto. you had 4047, which comes out to 162 per auto.
{{item:3153}} does 8% current health per auto. The damage dealt goes down as your health drops, Just average it at 162 per auto. Also if he used the active, that's another 404 damage 
{{item:3124}} does 15 magic damage every attack, and every other attack applies on hit effects again.
{{item:3036}} does an extra 15% damage
Red buff burns for 38 true damage
His E deals 50 + .25AD true damage every hit
Bounty hunter deals an extra 7.5% damage assuming he had 5 stacks

At level 18, yi has 111 base AD, and he had an additional 13 from runes, 48 from fervor, 25 from bork, 53 from rageblade, 50 from ldr, 20 from hexdrinker, and +10% bonus ad from his E passive, totaling 341 AD, meaning his E is dealing 135 true damage every auto.

So without any reduction, that would be 1036 damage every auto, and 1375 damage every other auto, 173 of which is true damage.
With reduction, that's approximately 389 every auto, and 473 every other auto. It would be higher at the beginning of the fight and lower at the end because of the variance in damage from bork, but that's average. If he used bork's active, that would have dealt about 100 damage.

The fight lasted just under 4 seconds, and Yi had capped attack speed, meaning he would have done 9-10 autos + alpha strike + bork + red buff burn. Average it to about 430 damage per auto. 
That's why you died.
